definition: to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: "Works every time, " the driver said with a wink.
sentences.chinese: “每次都管用，”司机眨巴了一下眼睛说。

sentences.english: I can give you quarters, if that'll help.
sentences.chinese: 如果二角五分的硬币管用的话，我可以给你换一些。

sentences.english: He argues that the case method is valuable in these sorts of issues.
sentences.chinese: 他认为，案例研究方法对于研究这类问题非常管用。

sentences.english: We’ve just seen how well that worked.
sentences.chinese: 我们也看到了这一招有多么管用。

sentences.english: "Sometimes the old ways are best," said Crowley.
sentences.chinese: “有时候还是老法子管用，”克鲁利说。

sentences.english: TIPS about the managers of the company, but none of them held water.
sentences.chinese: 就公司的管理问题他提了好几个建议，可没一个管用。

sentences.english: Remind your layout artist that the prettiest ad is rarely the most effective.
sentences.chinese: 提醒你的设计师，漂亮的广告很少会管用。

sentences.english: It was the most effective hitch-hiking sign I'd ever made.
sentences.chinese: 这是我这辈子做过最管用的搭车牌。

sentences.english: And you should be using one of these because guessing doesn't always work.
sentences.chinese: 你应该用二者中的一个，因为猜测不会总是管用的。

sentences.english: For users on dial-up, the 1MB limit still applies.
sentences.chinese: 对于拨号上网的用户，1MB的上限仍然管用。

sentences.english: What you said has some effect.
I don't know if it has implications for obesity.
sentences.chinese: 但我不知道这是否对肥胖病管用。

sentences.english: He ladled out many ideas, but none of them were useful.
sentences.chinese: 他出了很多主意，但没有一个管用。

sentences.english: This was worse than a thousand whippings.
sentences.chinese: 这一席话比一千下鞭打更管用。

sentences.english: Well, said the tree, an old stump is still as good for that.
sentences.chinese: 那么，树说，一个老树墩对这点还是挺管用的。

definition: easy to use/to function well/so that/in order to
to have an effect/to play a role/to be operative/to work/to function
to treat the symptoms but not the root cause
to no avail/achieving nothing/totally ineffective/to have no effect/to fall flat (esp. of joke or speech that is completely ignored)
Gaoming district of Foshan city 佛山市[Fo2 shan1 shi4], Guangdong
